{{Infobox Berry |name = #10 Razz |image = [[File:Razz.png]] |caption = A small hint of spiciness lingers in the red granules surrounding this Berry. Their centers have a dry taste. |growtime = 4m 10s |harvest = 7 berries |replant = 40% |points = 15 |flavor =
*10 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} === Description === '''Razz''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Cheri]] and at least 1 [[Leppa]]. === Growth Tables === ==== Growth Stages ==== {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 min 40 secs || 2 mins 30 secs || 2 mins 20 secs || 4 mins 10 secs - 8 mins 20 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RazzTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RazzTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RazzTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Flow Chart ===
{| style="text-align: center;" |+ '''Flow Chart to get this berry''' |- | Random
Drop || || Random
Drop |- | ↓ || || ↓ |- | [[File:Cheri.png|20px]] [[Cheri]] || + || [[File:Leppa.png|20px]] [[Leppa]] |- | colspan="3" | ↓ || |- | || [[File:Razz.png|20px]] [[Razz]] |}
=== Mutation Strategy === ==== Possible Planting Formations ==== You can fill your farm in following way to obtain Razz berries. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || || || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || || || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || |- | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || || || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |} ==== Timing Table ==== {| class="collapsible wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Leppa]] || - || - || - |- | [[Cheri]] || 30 secs until ripe || 20 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |} {{Berries}}
